entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • P/Invoke string encoding doesn't work properly in some cases #69660
  • Assertion failed '!foundDiff' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #69659
  • `BackgroundService` is started before `Host` is started. #69658
  • ARM32/ARM64 gcstress-extra failures #69657
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 Blazor wasm AOT Publish is very slow #69654
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #69653
  • Update zlib (zlib-Intel) to 1.2.12 #69652
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Arm64: Perf regressions from using SIMD registers in cp/init blk #68665
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: QUIC should have an IsSupported API #65802
    7.0.0
  • Review UX from runtime nugets #50707
    7.0.0
  • R2RDump does not work anymore #69655

PullRequests

Merged

  • Clear `NO_CSE` on struct addresses in `MorphCommaBlock` #69210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix R2RDump #69656
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Add coop GC transitions to various EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE functions; define to noop if no threads #69515
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Fix Create/StartActivity parentId nullability #69636
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: redundant branch destructure dominating and/or #69291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Exposing `Radix` and the remaining `Is*` generic-math APIs #69651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable tests for #63746. #69646
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Make ImplicitUsings does not work out of the box with .NET Framework project #24909
    6.0.4xx
  • Opt out of sending telemetry data by default for non-Microsoft builds #24474
    7.0.1xx
  • Add .Net 6 for arm64 to snap store #23550

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #1239
    Backlog
  • Open issues for `ref` fields #6149

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `CscCompile_WithSourceCodeRedirectedViaStandardInput_ProducesLibrary` fails locally #61452
  • `AssemblyLoading_DependencyInDifferentDirectory_Delete` fails locally #61451
  • `ConstantValueToStringTest01` fails locally #61450

Closed

  • Add a means to disable HoReload at the solution/project level #56679
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable IDE0060 (unused parameters) and CA1822 (make static) in compilers layer #61453
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61446
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RedisCache has no virtual methods? #41793
  • Kestrel network crash without any exceptions. #41792
  • Blazor Server-side Loses Connection Upon Extended Phone Lock #41791

Closed

  • StringContent constructors ignore content string #41786
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Vector instead of direct Intrinsics #41790
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Mark `OpenApi` PRs with `area-web-frameworks` #41787
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support multiple calls to WithTags in WithOpenApi #41779
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView w/ Binding, Delete first item -> Crash (Maui RC3, Android) #7406
  • [iOS] Build Action "SceneKitAsset" #7405
  • Issue Android version #7404
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer is not working #7403
  • Listview - When IsPullToRefreshEnabled is enabled controls on ItemTemplate are not clickable #7402
  • Object.GetType returns Null #7401
  • On Android platform .NET Maui App referencing NuGet Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 6.0.5 does not build #7400
  • The Webview does not display PDF #7399
  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented- not working in runtime #7398

Closed

  • Net Maui Blazor App cannot pair to a mac #7359

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 5.0 : Add or remove ValueGeneratedNever in IEntityTypeConfiguration does not change anything when update existing sql server database #28075

Closed

  • Why Ef Core MinLength constraint has no effect on database configuration? #28076
  • Improve logging around context model caching #11608
